aboutsection.title: Why Visit South Sudan?
aboutsection.description: South Sudan is a land of rich cultural diversity, breathtaking landscapes, and hidden treasures waiting to be explored. Whether you're seeking adventure, wildlife, or cultural immersion, this destination has something for everyone.

naturalBeauty.title: Untouched Natural Beauty
naturalBeauty.description: Explore stunning landscapes, from lush wetlands to towering mountains and vast savannas.

wildlife.title: Rich Wildlife
wildlife.description: Home to Africa's second-largest migration, featuring elephants, antelopes, and rare bird species.

culture.title: Diverse Cultures
culture.description: Experience 60+ ethnic groups, each with unique traditions, dances, and festivals.

funFacts.label: Fun Fact
funFacts.suddWetland: South Sudan is home to the Sudd, one of the largest wetlands in the world.
funFacts.bomaPark: Boma National Park is larger than some entire countries!
funFacts.ethnicGroups: South Sudan has over 60 different ethnic groups with rich cultural traditions.
funFacts.independence: South Sudan is the youngest country in the world, gaining independence on July 9, 2011.
funFacts.whiteNile: The White Nile, one of the two main tributaries of the Nile River, flows through South Sudan.
funFacts.animalMigration: South Sudan is home to the second-largest animal migration in the world, after the Serengeti.

testimonials.title: What Our Travelers Say
testimonials.testimonial1: An unforgettable experience! The landscapes are breathtaking, and the people are incredibly welcoming.
testimonials.testimonial2: South Sudan is a hidden gem. The cultural tours were eye-opening, and the guides were very knowledgeable.
testimonials.testimonial3: The wildlife safari was beyond expectations. I got to see elephants, giraffes, and even rare birds!
testimonials.testimonial4: As a local, I was proud to show my friends around. The service and hospitality were world-class.
testimonials.testimonial5: A truly immersive experience! Learning about the cultures and traditions was the highlight of my trip.
testimonials.testimonial6: Loved the boat safari in the Sudd wetlands! It was peaceful and beautiful beyond words.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.intro: Welcome to South Sudan Horizons, a digital platform designed to promote sustainable tourism in South Sudan by showcasing its cultural heritage, natural beauty, and wildlife. By registering for an account, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully before completing your registration.
terms.acceptanceText: By registering an account with South Sudan Horizons, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to these Terms and Conditions, as well as our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, you may not register or use the platform.
terms.eligibilityText: You must be at least 18 years old to register an account. You must provide accurate, complete, and current information during registration, including your full name, email address, and, if applicable, a valid guide or admin key. Registration as a 'Guide' or 'Admin' requires a specific key provided by South Sudan Horizons administrators to ensure authorized access to restricted roles.
terms.accountResponsibilitiesText: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password and account credentials. You agree to notify us immediately at {email} if you suspect any unauthorized use of your account. Your account is personal to you and may not be shared with or transferred to others.
terms.emailVerificationText: Upon registration, you will receive a verification email to the address provided. You must verify your email within 1 hour by clicking the link provided, or your account may remain inactive until verification is completed. Failure to verify your email will prevent you from logging in or accessing platform features.
terms.userRolesTouristText: General users who can browse, book tours, submit reviews, and explore South Sudan’s attractions.
terms.userRolesGuideText: Authorized individuals who can create and manage tour listings, subject to verification with a Guide Key.
terms.userRolesAdminText: Platform administrators with full access to manage content, users, and bookings, subject to verification with an Admin Key.
terms.userRolesFooter: Misrepresentation of your role (e.g., using an invalid key) may result in account suspension or termination.
terms.useOfPlatformText: You agree to use South Sudan Horizons solely for lawful purposes related to tourism, such as booking tours, exploring attractions, or managing tourism content (for Guides/Admins). You may not use the platform to post harmful, offensive, or misleading content, including false reviews or fraudulent tour listings. All content you submit must align with our mission of promoting sustainable tourism and respecting South Sudan’s cultural and natural heritage.
terms.paymentAndBookingsText: Tour bookings are facilitated through Stripe, and you agree to provide accurate payment information. Refunds are subject to the policies of individual tour providers, as outlined during the booking process.
terms.intellectualPropertyText: All content on South Sudan Horizons, including images, videos, and text, is owned by the platform or its contributors and is protected by copyright laws. By submitting content (e.g., reviews, tour photos), you grant South Sudan Horizons a non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, display, and distribute it for promotional purposes.
terms.privacyText: Your personal data will be collected, stored, and processed in accordance with our Privacy Policy, ensuring compliance with applicable data protection laws. We use your email for verification, notifications, and promotional updates (which you can opt out of).
terms.terminationText: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if you violate these Terms and Conditions, misuse the platform, or engage in fraudulent activity. You may delete your account at any time by contacting {email}.
terms.liabilityText: South Sudan Horizons is not liable for any damages arising from your use of the platform, including booking disputes or third-party interactions. The platform is provided 'as is,' and we do not guarantee uninterrupted access, especially in areas with limited internet connectivity.
terms.sustainabilityCommitmentText: By registering, you agree to support our mission of sustainable tourism, which includes respecting local communities, preserving cultural heritage, and minimizing environmental impact during your interactions with South Sudan’s tourism offerings.
terms.changesToTermsText: We may update these Terms and Conditions periodically. You will be notified of significant changes via email or a platform announcement. Continued use after updates constitutes acceptance of the revised terms.
terms.governingLawText: These Terms and Conditions are governed by the laws of South Sudan. Any disputes will be resolved through mediation or courts in South Sudan.
terms.contactUsText: For questions or concerns about these Terms, please email {email}.
terms.agreementFooter: By checking the box and submitting your registration, you confirm your agreement to these Terms and Conditions.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At South Sudan Horizons, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you use our platform.
privacy.infoCollectText: We collect personal information such as your full name, email address, and payment details (via Stripe) when you register, book tours, or interact with our services.
privacy.howWeUseText: Your data is used to process bookings, verify your account, send notifications, and provide personalized tour recommendations. We may also use it for marketing purposes (with your consent).
privacy.dataSharingText: We share your information with tour guides (for booking purposes) and payment processors (Stripe). We do not sell your data to third parties.
privacy.dataSecurityText: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your information, but no system is completely secure. You use our platform at your own risk.
privacy.yourRightsText: You can access, update, or delete your account by contacting us at {email}. You may opt out of promotional emails at any time.
privacy.cookiesText: We use cookies to enhance your experience (e.g., remembering login details). You can disable cookies in your browser settings.
privacy.changesText: We may update this Privacy Policy. Changes will be posted here, and significant updates will be communicated via email or platform announcements.
